issue.title: Not able to compile code with solana
issue.body:
hello,

i have used secp256k1 in my solana program and compiled code. but i'm being stopped from moving further with this compilation error. 

```
> helloworld@0.0.1 build:program-rust /home/webelight1/Documents/Smart contracts POC/solana/example-helloworld
> cargo build-bpf --manifest-path=./src/program-rust/Cargo.toml --bpf-out-dir=dist/program

BPF SDK: /home/webelight1/.local/share/solana/install/releases/1.7.12/solana-release/bin/sdk/bpf
Running: rustup toolchain list -v
Running: cargo +bpf build --target bpfel-unknown-unknown --release
   Compiling secp256k1-sys v0.4.1
The following warnings were emitted during compilation:

warning: depend/secp256k1/src/secp256k1.c:7:9: warning: 'SECP256K1_BUILD' macro redefined [-Wmacro-redefined]
warning: #define SECP256K1_BUILD
warning:         ^
warning: <command line>:1:9: note: previous definition is here
warning: #define SECP256K1_BUILD 1
warning:         ^
warning: In file included from depend/secp256k1/contrib/lax_der_parsing.c:7:
warning: /usr/include/string.h:26:10: fatal error: 'bits/libc-header-start.h' file not found
warning: #include <bits/libc-header-start.h>
warning:          ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
warning: In file included from depend/secp256k1/src/secp256k1.c:12:
warning: In file included from depend/secp256k1/src/assumptions.h:10:
warning: In file included from /home/webelight1/.cache/solana/v1.9/bpf-tools/llvm/lib/clang/12.0.1/include/limits.h:21:
warning: /usr/include/limits.h:26:10: fatal error: 'bits/libc-header-start.h' file not found
warning: #include <bits/libc-header-start.h>
warning:          ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
warning: 1 error generated.
warning: 1 warning and 1 error generated.

error: failed to run custom build command for `secp256k1-sys v0.4.1`

Caused by:
  process didn't exit successfully: `/home/webelight1/Documents/Smart contracts POC/solana/example-helloworld/src/program-rust/target/release/build/secp256k1-sys-756eb817d8ad371d/build-script-build` (exit code: 1)
  --- stdout
  TARGET = Some("bpfel-unknown-unknown")
  OPT_LEVEL = Some("3")
  HOST = Some("x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu")
  CC_bpfel-unknown-unknown = None
  CC_bpfel_unknown_unknown = None
  TARGET_CC = None
  CC = Some("/home/webelight1/.local/share/solana/install/releases/1.7.12/solana-release/bin/sdk/bpf/dependencies/bpf-tools/llvm/bin/clang")
  CFLAGS_bpfel-unknown-unknown = None
  CFLAGS_bpfel_unknown_unknown = None
  TARGET_CFLAGS = None
  CFLAGS = None
  CRATE_CC_NO_DEFAULTS = None
  DEBUG = Some("false")
  CC_bpfel-unknown-unknown = None
  CC_bpfel_unknown_unknown = None
  TARGET_CC = None
  CC = Some("/home/webelight1/.local/share/solana/install/releases/1.7.12/solana-release/bin/sdk/bpf/dependencies/bpf-tools/llvm/bin/clang")
  CFLAGS_bpfel-unknown-unknown = None
  CFLAGS_bpfel_unknown_unknown = None
  TARGET_CFLAGS = None
  CFLAGS = None
  CRATE_CC_NO_DEFAULTS = None
  running: "/home/webelight1/.local/share/solana/install/releases/1.7.12/solana-release/bin/sdk/bpf/dependencies/bpf-tools/llvm/bin/clang" "-O3" "-ffunction-sections" "-fdata-sections" "-fPIC" "--target=bpfel-unknown-unknown" "-I" "depend/secp256k1/" "-I" "depend/secp256k1/include" "-I" "depend/secp256k1/src" "-Wall" "-Wextra" "-DSECP256K1_BUILD=1" "-DSECP256K1_API=" "-DENABLE_MODULE_ECDH=1" "-DENABLE_MODULE_SCHNORRSIG=1" "-DENABLE_MODULE_EXTRAKEYS=1" "-DECMULT_GEN_PREC_BITS=4" "-DUSE_NUM_NONE=1" "-DUSE_FIELD_INV_BUILTIN=1" "-DUSE_SCALAR_INV_BUILTIN=1" "-DECMULT_WINDOW_SIZE=15" "-DUSE_EXTERNAL_DEFAULT_CALLBACKS=1" "-o" "/home/webelight1/Documents/Smart contracts POC/solana/example-helloworld/src/program-rust/target/bpfel-unknown-unknown/release/build/secp256k1-sys-7fec6ec1a4d04dc2/out/depend/secp256k1/contrib/lax_der_parsing.o" "-c" "depend/secp256k1/contrib/lax_der_parsing.c"
  running: "/home/webelight1/.local/share/solana/install/releases/1.7.12/solana-release/bin/sdk/bpf/dependencies/bpf-tools/llvm/bin/clang" "-O3" "-ffunction-sections" "-fdata-sections" "-fPIC" "--target=bpfel-unknown-unknown" "-I" "depend/secp256k1/" "-I" "depend/secp256k1/include" "-I" "depend/secp256k1/src" "-Wall" "-Wextra" "-DSECP256K1_BUILD=1" "-DSECP256K1_API=" "-DENABLE_MODULE_ECDH=1" "-DENABLE_MODULE_SCHNORRSIG=1" "-DENABLE_MODULE_EXTRAKEYS=1" "-DECMULT_GEN_PREC_BITS=4" "-DUSE_NUM_NONE=1" "-DUSE_FIELD_INV_BUILTIN=1" "-DUSE_SCALAR_INV_BUILTIN=1" "-DECMULT_WINDOW_SIZE=15" "-DUSE_EXTERNAL_DEFAULT_CALLBACKS=1" "-o" "/home/webelight1/Documents/Smart contracts POC/solana/example-helloworld/src/program-rust/target/bpfel-unknown-unknown/release/build/secp256k1-sys-7fec6ec1a4d04dc2/out/depend/secp256k1/src/secp256k1.o" "-c" "depend/secp256k1/src/secp256k1.c"
  cargo:warning=depend/secp256k1/src/secp256k1.c:7:9: warning: 'SECP256K1_BUILD' macro redefined [-Wmacro-redefined]
  cargo:warning=#define SECP256K1_BUILD
  cargo:warning=        ^
  cargo:warning=<command line>:1:9: note: previous definition is here
  cargo:warning=#define SECP256K1_BUILD 1
  cargo:warning=        ^
  cargo:warning=In file included from depend/secp256k1/contrib/lax_der_parsing.c:7:
  cargo:warning=/usr/include/string.h:26:10: fatal error: 'bits/libc-header-start.h' file not found
  cargo:warning=#include <bits/libc-header-start.h>
  cargo:warning=         ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  cargo:warning=In file included from depend/secp256k1/src/secp256k1.c:12:
  cargo:warning=In file included from depend/secp256k1/src/assumptions.h:10:
  cargo:warning=In file included from /home/webelight1/.cache/solana/v1.9/bpf-tools/llvm/lib/clang/12.0.1/include/limits.h:21:
  cargo:warning=/usr/include/limits.h:26:10: fatal error: 'bits/libc-header-start.h' file not found
  cargo:warning=#include <bits/libc-header-start.h>
  cargo:warning=         ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  cargo:warning=1 error generated.
  exit code: 1
  cargo:warning=1 warning and 1 error generated.
  exit code: 1

  --- stderr


  error occurred: Command "/home/webelight1/.local/share/solana/install/releases/1.7.12/solana-release/bin/sdk/bpf/dependencies/bpf-tools/llvm/bin/clang" "-O3" "-ffunction-sections" "-fdata-sections" "-fPIC" "--target=bpfel-unknown-unknown" "-I" "depend/secp256k1/" "-I" "depend/secp256k1/include" "-I" "depend/secp256k1/src" "-Wall" "-Wextra" "-DSECP256K1_BUILD=1" "-DSECP256K1_API=" "-DENABLE_MODULE_ECDH=1" "-DENABLE_MODULE_SCHNORRSIG=1" "-DENABLE_MODULE_EXTRAKEYS=1" "-DECMULT_GEN_PREC_BITS=4" "-DUSE_NUM_NONE=1" "-DUSE_FIELD_INV_BUILTIN=1" "-DUSE_SCALAR_INV_BUILTIN=1" "-DECMULT_WINDOW_SIZE=15" "-DUSE_EXTERNAL_DEFAULT_CALLBACKS=1" "-o" "/home/webelight1/Documents/Smart contracts POC/solana/example-helloworld/src/program-rust/target/bpfel-unknown-unknown/release/build/secp256k1-sys-7fec6ec1a4d04dc2/out/depend/secp256k1/contrib/lax_der_parsing.o" "-c" "depend/secp256k1/contrib/lax_der_parsing.c" with args "clang" did not execute successfully (status code exit code: 1).


npm ERR! code ELIFECYCLE
npm ERR! errno 1
npm ERR! helloworld@0.0.1 build:program-rust: `cargo build-bpf --manifest-path=./src/program-rust/Cargo.toml --bpf-out-dir=dist/program`
npm ERR! Exit status 1
npm ERR! 
npm ERR! Failed at the helloworld@0.0.1 build:program-rust script.
npm ERR! This is probably not a problem with npm. There is likely additional logging output above.

npm ERR! A complete log of this run can be found in:
npm ERR!     /home/webelight1/.npm/_logs/2021-09-24T12_53_36_456Z-debug.log
```

can you please help me out in fixing this compilation issue ?

events.body: Hi @jayeshsupra. This does not seem to be an issue with libsecp, but with something else in your toolchain. You may be more successful opening an issue there.
